summary: Completed frontend testing of the new Budget feature (Expense Periods and Expected Items system). All tested features are working correctly. The Budget tab loads with Budget vs Actual comparison, Expense Periods can be created, Expected Items dialog works, Add Transaction dialog opens without crashing (previously reported bug is FIXED), and transactions are correctly reflected in budget comparison.

issues: Console warning: Missing `Description` or `aria-describedby={undefined}` for {DialogContent} - accessibility improvement needed

passed_tests: Frontend: Finance page loads correctly with summary cards (Total Balance, Accounts, Avg Monthly Burn, Runway)
Frontend: All 6 tabs visible (Transactions, Accounts, Savings, Budget, Monthly, Runway)
Frontend: Budget tab loads correctly with Budget vs Actual comparison view
Frontend: Budget vs Actual shows Expected Income, Expected Expenses, Expected Profit, Actual Profit cards
Frontend: Budget Items table displays expected items with Status, Item, Type, Frequency, Expected, Actual, Diff columns
Frontend: Unbudgeted Transactions section shows transactions not matching any budget item
Frontend: Expense Periods section displays existing periods with Monthly Income, Monthly Expenses, Net Monthly, Items count
Frontend: Add Period button opens New Expense Period dialog
Frontend: New Expense Period dialog has Project, Name, Start Month, End Month, Notes fields
Frontend: Creating a new Expense Period works - 'Period created' toast shown
Frontend: Add Expected Item button opens New Expected Item dialog
Frontend: New Expected Item dialog has Expense Period, Name, Income/Expense toggle, Amount, Frequency, Category, Notes fields
Frontend: Budget month picker (data-testid='budget-month-picker') works for selecting different months
Frontend: Add Transaction button (data-testid='add-transaction-btn') opens dialog WITHOUT CRASHING (BUG FIXED)
Frontend: New Transaction dialog has Income/Expense toggle, Date, Amount, Project, Account, Category, Savings Goal, Notes fields
Frontend: Creating a transaction works - 'Transaction created' toast shown
Frontend: Total Balance updates after transaction creation (500€ → 3500€)
Frontend: Budget comparison updates after transaction - Actual Income and Actual Profit reflect new transaction
Frontend: Budget Items table shows matched status (green checkmark) when actual transaction matches expected item
Frontend: Salary budget item correctly matched with 3000€ income transaction
action_items: Minor: Add aria-describedby to DialogContent components to fix accessibility warning
critical_code_review_comments: Budget feature implementation is well-structured with clear separation between Budget vs Actual comparison, Budget Items, Unbudgeted Transactions, and Expense Periods sections
All interactive elements have proper data-testid attributes for testing
Budget comparison correctly calculates expected vs actual amounts and shows differences
Transaction matching logic works - Salary item matched with income transaction of same category
EUR currency formatting is consistent throughout the UI
Month picker allows easy navigation between budget periods
The previously reported Add Transaction dialog crash (SelectItem value issue) has been FIXED
seed_data_creation: Created during testing: TEST_Budget_Period_2026 expense period, TEST_Budget_Salary_Transaction (3000€ income transaction)
context_for_next_testing_agent: Budget feature fully tested and working. The new Expense Periods and Expected Items system replaces the old Recurring Transactions feature. Key test IDs: tab-budget, add-period-btn, add-transaction-btn, budget-month-picker. Existing test data includes: 2026 Budget period with Salary (3000€ income), Rent (800€ expense), Utilities (150€ expense) expected items. TEST_Budget_Period_2026 period was created during testing with 0 items. Two income transactions exist: UI Test Income Transaction (500€) and TEST_Budget_Salary_Transaction (3000€).
